title: LFM for a very active team
body:
I am looking for 4 very active players who can be on every day to play as a team to smash out heaps of 5v5 ranked games. You must have a microphone and be able to use curse.

Requirements:
Turning 17+ this year
Microphone
very active
don't rage
Can stay positive during a game
Never surrender during a game
Willing to practice

I will be filling in whatever role is left so for now ALL ROLES ARE OPEN

top:
mid:
jungle:
adc:
support:


My IGN is whitepumah.


Please fill out this application form:

Age:

Microhpone: yes/no

Preferred role:

Top 3 champs in that role:

How many nights a week can you play for more than 4 hours:

replies.body:
HE RETURNS, THE INFAMOUS WHITEPUMAH. 
This guy has plagued the forums with his %%%%posts for many years and has never been taken seriously, hes bronze and thinks he deserves challenger, joining this team will only lead to being faced with the most arrogant and ignorant player you've ever seen.
Spaghett
Please leave my Senpai alone :( go back to your waifu pillow

Age: 18

Microhpone: yep

Preferred role: ADC

Top 3 champs in that role: Graves, Vayne, jinx (i can play all adcs well though)

How many nights a week can you play for more than 4 hours: every night except wednesday/friday
